song_lyrics: Bhakti kartā chhuṭe māro prāṇ, Yogī evu māgu re,
Rahe janamojanam tāro sāth, Yogī evu māgu re...
Rahe ant samay tāru dhyān... Yogī evu māgu re 1
Shvasochchhvāse raṭu tāru nām... Yogī evu māgu re 2
Mārā pāp ne tāp te bāḷī dīdhā,
Āpo Akshardhāmnu sukh... Yogī evu māgu re 3
title: Bhakti kartā chhuṭe māro prāṇ Yogī evu māgu re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-983: unknown

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
